item.title: Countdown to New Year 2026 in Des Moines

-

-
168414    minutes

-

+

+
168117    minutes

+
10087024  seconds

 

 

-
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Sperryville](/worldclock/usa/sperryville) time)

+
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Des Moines](/worldclock/usa/des-moines) time)

 

 
[](/counters/fullscreen.html?mode=a&year=2026)

+

-
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Sperryville](/worldclock/usa/sperryville) time)

+

-

+
